title: Mobile-Supported Arabic Learning: Practitioner-Tailored Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arabic literacy and fundamental mobile device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical language course assuming Arabic communication needs in workplace settings for medical/legal/technical professionals. Emphasis on mobile learning via smartphones and tablets

learning_goals: Within one week, learners will utilize 200 essential Arabic vocabulary words for workplace contexts, categorized by situational contexts, with at least 80% accuracy.
Using a mobile app, learners will construct 50 simple sentences applying basic Arabic grammatical structures.
Utilizing mobile-based speech recognition, learners will achieve at least 70% accuracy in Arabic pronunciation.
In real workplace scenarios (e.g., patient consultations, contract drafting, technical explanations), learners will perform basic communication (greetings, questions, explanations) in Arabic.

resources: Speech recognition module for pronunciation assessment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
